titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [2. 6. 1936]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 165; deutsch: Briefe, S. 197; Cambridge Letters, S. 276).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I am having a social gathering of my students in my rooms, on Friday at 4.30. Would you mind comming? If I don't hear from you I shall expect you.
